modShortDescription: Removes the headlamp, flashlight, and burning shaft mods.
modDescription:
Removes the headlamp, flashlight, and burning shaft mods.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/DayhawkSilverstar/7DaysToDieMods/tree/master/Dayhawks%20No%20Mobile%20Light%20Sources)**
